about.education1: I graduated in Game Development, solidifying my affinity with the digital world. Currently, I'm studying Information Systems at the Federal University of Uberlândia (UFU) and working on personal projects.
about.education2: I've participated in hackathons and competitions, learning a lot about the field. I'm excited about the future and committed to applying my knowledge to contribute to projects that can positively impact people.
about.hobbies: Besides all that, in my free time I enjoy gaming and playing guitar.
